page.title: 14AMENITIES IN CAYTON
page.content: Clubs to join are: Over 60's Club, Art Club, Cricket Club, Ladies' Club, Keep Fit Club, Sewing Circle, Dancing Club, Judo Club, Whist Drive Club. For children there is a play group, Guides and Brownies and a playing field with pavilion. Shops: butcher's, post office, garage, fish and chip shop, 2 general and news agents (+ Osgodby 2), 2 hairdresser's (+ Osgodby 1). There are 3 public houses _"Star Inn", "Blacksmith's Arms" and "The Barn" at Osgodby. There is a bus service but the railway station closed in 1952. Village walks are spoilt by traffic but the beach is only 1 km away. The Primary School serves Cayton, Osgodby, Lebberston and Gristhorpe. It has football,cricket and netball teams and a school choir and orchestra.
